    • checkMatch

      public Boolean checkMatch(Card other1, Card other2)
      Checks if this card matches with two other cards.
      Parameters:
      other1 - The first other card being compared to.
      other2 - The second other card being compared to.
      Returns:
      True if the three cards match, false otherwise.
